ingredients: Vodka: 3 oz.|Pickle Juice: 1 1/2 oz.|Tomato Juice: 5 oz.|Pepper, white: 2 dashes|Salt: 1 pinch (celery)|Horseradish: 1/2 tsp.|Steak Sauce: 3 drops|Tabasco Sauce: 6 drops|Worcestershire Sauce: 3 drops|
instructions: Fill glass with ice.  Add vodka, celery salt, pepper, hot sauce, steak sauce and worcestershire.  Add pickle juice (or try pepper juice) and then tomato juice.  Stir, then add horseradish and stir again.  Celery, pickels, and olives make great garnish!
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our charming readers, Mike!

ingredients: Gin: 2 oz.|Carbonated Water/Club Soda: Fill with|Lemon Juice: 1 oz.|Cherries/Maraschinos: 1 whole|Sugar, powdered: 1 tsp.|Oranges: 1 slice|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a collins glass with ice and garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

ingredients: Curacao, orange: 1/2 oz.|Rum, dark: 1 oz.|Rum, light: 1 oz.|Lime Juice: 1/3 oz. (fresh)|Orgeat Syrup: 1/2 oz.|Sugar Syrup: 1/6 oz.|
instructions: Shake everything except the dark rum in a shaker filled with ice.  Strain into a highball glass over crushed ice. Float with the rum and garnish with a pineapple spear, lime peel and a straw.

ingredients: Liqueur, orange: 1 oz.|Tequila, gold: 1 oz.|Tequila, white: 1 oz.|Triple Sec: 1 oz.|Lime Juice: 1 oz.|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.
contributor: thomtlc

ingredients: Gin: 2 oz.|Vodka: 2 oz.|Vermouth, dry: 1/2 oz.|Olive: 3 pieces|
instructions: Add ingredients (except for olives) to a cocktail shaker, shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.  Add olives as garnish.
contributor: Earthman J

ingredients: Rum, dark: 2 oz.|Water: 4 oz. (boiling)|Cloves: 1 whole|Sugar, brown: 1 tsp.|Butter: 1 tsp.|
instructions: Pour the water and the brown sugar into an Irish Coffee glass.  Stir until the brown sugar is dissolved.  Add the Rum and the clove and stir.  Drop the butter on top of the drink, and dust with a light layer of nutmeg.

ingredients: Amaretto: 1 part|Grand Marnier: 1 part|Southern Comfort: 1 part|
instructions: Use an old fashioned glass, and add one part Amaretto, one part Grand Marnier, one part Southern Comfort.

ingredients: Brandy, blackberry: 1/2 oz.|Rum, light: 1 1/2 oz.|Cream of coconut: 1 oz.|Pineapple Juice: 4 oz.|Pineapple: 1 slice|Ice: 1/2 Cup|Whipped cream: Top with|
instructions: Chill a highball glass.  Blend rum, pineapple juice, cream of coconut and ice in a bar blender.  Pour into the chilled glass over ice cubes.  Layer the brandy on top, and top with whipped cream.  Garnish with a slice of pineapple.

ingredients: Kahlua: 2/3 oz.|Vodka: 1 2/3 oz.|Cream: 1 oz.|
instructions: Pour coffee liqueur and vodka into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Float the cream on top and stir slowly.

ingredients: Liqueur, melon: 1 oz.|Rum, coconut: 1 oz.|Cranberry Juice: 2 oz.|Pineapple Juice: 2 oz.|
instructions: Mix ingredients over ice in glass. Shake if preferred.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our immensely powerful readers, Kevin Weigel!

ingredients: Gin: 1 1/2 oz.|Tonic Water: Fill with|Lime: 1 twist|
instructions: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Garnish with a twist of lime.

ingredients: Gin: 2 oz.|Vermouth, dry: 1 tsp.|Olive: 1 whole|
instructions: Swish a cocktail glass with a teaspoon of vermouth, discard the excess.  Add the gin and one or two olives on a pick.

ingredients: Liqueur, coffee: 2/3 oz.|Vodka: 1 2/3 oz.|
instructions: Build over ice in a rocks glass.

ingredients: Gin: 2 oz.|Vermouth, dry: 1 tbsp.|Olive Juice: 2 tbsp.|Olive: 1 whole|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice (including the olive!).  Strain into a well-chilled cocktail glass.  Add olive from the shaker.

ingredients: Rum, light: 1 1/2 oz.|Syrup, Gomme: 1/6 oz.|Lime: 1/2 oz.|
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

ingredients: Vodka: 1 1/2 oz.|Lemon Juice: 1/2 oz.|Tomato Juice: 3 oz.|Salt: 1 dash|Tabasco Sauce: 1 dash|Worcestershire Sauce: 1 dash|
instructions: Add dashes of salt and pepper, Tabasco and Worcestershire to a highball glass, then add other ingredients. Stir gently. Garnish with a celery stalk and a lemon wedge.

ingredients: Vermouth, dry: 3/4 oz.|Vodka: 1 1/2 oz.|Olive: 1 whole|
instructions: Shaken not stirred.  Garnish with olive and toothpick.

ingredients: Rum, light: 2 oz.|Rum, overproof/151 proof: 1 oz.|7-up: 8 oz.|Lime Juice: 1 oz.|Syrup, passion fruit: 2 oz.|
instructions: Shake all ingredients except 151-proof rum in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Pour into a hurricane glass and float the 151-proof rum on top.  Drink through a straw from the bottom up.

ingredients: Creme de Cacao, white: 2/3 oz.|Creme de Menthe, green: 2/3 oz.|Cream: 2/3 oz.|
instructions: Shake ingredients for a few seconds in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

ingredients: Vodka: 2 oz.|Lemon Juice: 1/4 oz.|Cucumber: 2 slices|Mint: 3 pieces|Sugar Syrup: 1/2 oz.|
instructions: Muddle mint and a cucumber slice in a cocktail shaker.  Add other ingredients and ice.  Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass, and garnish with a slice of cucumber and a fresh mint sprig.
contributor: virgo972

ingredients: Rum, light: 1 1/3 oz.|Carbonated Water/Club Soda: Fill with|Lime Juice: 1 oz.|Lime: 2 wedges|Mint: 12 pieces (leaves)|Sugar Syrup: 1 1/2 oz.|
instructions: Gently muddle the lime juice, mint leaves, and sugar syrup together at the bottom of the glass.  Fill the glass with ice, then slowly add the rum.  Fill with soda and stir gently to bring the leaves upwards into the mixture.  Optionally add lime wedges as an addition garnish.

ingredients: Vodka: 1 1/2 oz.|Clamato Juice: Fill with|Celery: 1 stick|Tabasco Sauce: 3 dashes|Worcestershire Sauce: 3 dashes|
instructions: Rim a highball glass with salt and pepper or bar salt.  Add a bit of ice, then add vodka.  Fill with clamato juice and add tabasco and worcestershire.  Garnish with a stick of celery, a green bean, or a stalk of asparagus.

ingredients: Rum, white: 1 oz.|Coconut Milk: 1 oz.|Pineapple Juice: 3 oz.|
instructions: Add everything into blender with crushed ice.  Blend, adding ice until desired consistency is reached.  Pour into hurricane glasses and garnish with a pineapple wedge (and/or a cherry), and little umbrellas or a straw.

ingredients: Triple Sec: 2/3 oz.|Tequila, white: 1 1/4 oz.|Lemon Juice: 1/2 oz. (or lime juice)|Salt: 3 pinches|
instructions: Salt the rim of a coupe (or coupette) glass. Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

ingredients: Rum, coconut: 1 part|Schnapps, peach: 1 part|Tuaca: 1 part|Cranberry Juice: 1 part|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our courageous, yet humble readers, Kevin Weigel!

ingredients: Rum, coconut: 1 part|Schnapps, peach: 1 part|Tuaca: 1 part|Pineapple Juice: 1 part|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our funktastic readers, Kevin Weigel!

ingredients: J��_germeister: 1 part|Liqueur, melon: 1 part|Liqueur, raspberry: 1 part|Cranberry Juice: 2 parts|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our courageous, yet humble readers, Kevin Weigel!

ingredients: Vodka: 1 1/2 oz.|Lemon Juice: 1/4 oz.|Water: 1 Cup|Cucumber: 1 oz. (juice)|Mint: 1 handful|Sugar: 1 Cup|
instructions: First: bring water, sugar, and mint to a boil. Let cool. Shake 1.5 oz. vodka, 1/4 oz. fresh lemon juice, 1 oz. cucumber juice and 1/2 oz. of the mint syrup in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.
contributor: virgo972

ingredients: Gin: 2 oz.|Triple Sec: 1 oz.|Orange Juice: Fill with|Tonic Water: 2 oz.|Lime: 1 wedge|
instructions: Put some ice cubes into glass.  Add Gin, Triple Sec, and then tonic water.  Fill with orange juice.  Stir.  Garnish with lime wedge.
contributor: starfish4882

ingredients: Champagne: 2 1/2 oz.|Orange Juice: 2 1/2 oz.|
instructions: Pour chilled orange juice, and add chilled champagne.

ingredients: Gin: 1 1/2 oz.|Triple Sec: 1 1/2 oz.|Vodka: 1 1/2 oz.|Orange Juice: 7 1/2 oz.|
instructions: Stir ingredients into highball glass and serve.  Best if orange juice and vodka are chilled.

ingredients: Gin: 1 1/2 oz.|Schnapps, peach: 1 1/2 oz.|Orange Juice: Fill with|Ice: 4 cubes|
instructions: Put ice into glass and pour in Gin and peach schnapps.  Fill with orange juice.  Stir and enjoy!
contributor: starfish4882

ingredients: Vodka: 1 1/2 oz.|Lime Juice: 1 oz.|Sugar, powdered: 1 tsp.|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

ingredients: Amaretto: 1/2 oz.|Southern Comfort: 1/2 oz.|7-up: Fill, 1/2|Orange Juice: Fill, 1/2|
instructions: In a shot glass, combine 1/2 oz. Amaretto and 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort. Place shot glass in a highball glass. Fill half-way to shot glass with 7-Up, fill to just below top of shot glass with Orange Juice. Shoot it.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our courageous, yet humble readers, Serena!

ingredients: Gin: 2 oz.|Schnapps, peach: 1 oz.|Triple Sec: 1/2 oz.|Orange Juice: Fill with|Tonic Water: 2 oz.|Lime: 1 wedge|
instructions: Put some ice cubes into a glass.  Add Gin, Triple Sec, and Peach Schnapps.  Pour in tonic and orange juice.  Stir.  Garnish with lime wedge.
contributor: starfish4882

ingredients: Irish Cream: 1 part|Kahlua: 1 part|Tia Maria: 1 part|Vodka: 1 part|
instructions: Build this drink over ice and stir.  Serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

ingredients: Kahlua: 1 part|Vodka: 2 parts|Cream: Fill with|Ice: 3 cubes|
instructions: Add ice, vodka, and Kahlua. Fill to the top with cream. Transfer to a shaker then back into the glass for a good mix.
contributor: jst83

ingredients: Gin: 1 oz.|Southern Comfort: 1 oz.|Vodka: 1 oz.|Grenadine: 1 dash|Orange Juice: Fill with|Pineapple Juice: Fill with|
instructions: Add the alcoholic ingredients to a cocktail glass without ice.  Fill the rest of the glass with pineapple and orange juice, mixing slightly.  Add a dash of grenadine on top, but don't stir it in.

ingredients: Gin: 2 oz.|Grapefruit Juice: 2 oz.|Orange Juice: 3 oz.|Lime: 1 slice|
instructions: Measure ice into a cocktail shaker with a highball glass.  Add ingredients and shake well.  Pour into highball glass and garnish with a slice of lime.

ingredients: Benedictine: 17/100 oz.|Brandy, cherry: 2/3 oz.|Triple Sec: 17/100 oz.|Gin: 1 1/3 oz.|Bitters, Angostura: 1 dash|Grenadine: 1/3 oz.|Lemon Juice: 1 oz.|Pineapple Juice: 2 2/3 oz.|
instructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry.

ingredients: Rum, spiced: 1/2 oz.|Curacao, blue: 1/2 oz.|Rum, coconut: 1/2 oz.|Liqueur, melon: 1/2 oz.|Pineapple Juice: Fill with|Sour Mix: 1 splash|
instructions: Put all measured ingredients in glass and fill the remainder with pineapple juice. Shake vigorously. Garnish with a flag.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our funktastic readers, Nicole Ferrera!

ingredients: Lime Cordial: 1 splash|Southern Comfort: 1 shot|
instructions: It's best to prepare multiple shots at the same time. Start with a cup full of ice, add Southern Comfort until the cup is almost full. Then add lime juice as desired, mix and pour into shot glasses. Enjoy!
contributor: DustyRhodes

ingredients: Goldschl��_ger: 1 part|J��_germeister: 2 parts|
instructions: Fill a shot glass 2/3 of the way with Jagermeister.  Fill the rest with Goldschlager. Looks like a Starry Night.
contributor: bwheeler19

ingredients: Rum, dark: 1 1/2 oz.|Rum, gold: 1 1/2 oz.|Rum, light: 1 1/2 oz.|Grenadine: 1 dash|Orange Juice: 2 1/2 oz.|Pineapple Juice: 2 oz.|Sour Mix: 2 oz.|
instructions: Put a dash of grenadine on the bottom of the glass.  Fill with cracked ice and add ingredients.  Stir very gently before serving.

ingredients: Kahlua: 1 1/2 oz.|Vodka: 2 oz.|Cream: as desired|
instructions: Add vodka and Kahlua to a rocks glass over ice.  Fill with desired amount of cream.

ingredients: Grand Marnier: 1 1/2 oz.|Iced Tea: 5 oz.|Lemonade: 5 oz.|
instructions: First, mix the Iced tea and the Lemonade in a separate glass. Add the grand marnier to a second collins glass. Then, pour the mixed contents of the Iced Tea-Lemonade into the glass with the Grand Marnier. Stir and drink.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our dastardly readers, Sheed!

ingredients: Amaretto: 2 oz.|Lemon Juice: 1 oz.|Oranges: 1 slice|
instructions: It takes a bit of skill to make a truly good Amaretto Sour.  First of all, use fresh lemon juice whenever possible, and use a chilled sour glass as well.  Rub the rim of your glass with a lemon slice, and dip it in bar sugar until the rim is well frosted.  Shake amaretto and lemon juice in a shaker, then strain into sour glass.  Garnish with an orange slice or maraschino cherry, and enjoy!

ingredients: Liqueur, melon: 1 part|Rum, coconut: 1 part|Pineapple Juice: 1 part|
instructions: Combine ingredients in a glass.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our charming readers, Meredith!

ingredients: Curacao, blue: 1 oz.|Rum, coconut: 1 oz.|Pineapple Juice: Fill with|Sprite: Fill with|
instructions: Fill lower half of glass with ice cubes.  Add rum and curacao. Fill glass half with pineapple juice, and half with Sprite. Stir slightly and serve.

ingredients: Schnapps, peach: 2/3 oz.|Vodka: 1 1/3 oz.|Cranberry Juice: 1 1/3 oz.|Orange Juice: 1 1/3 oz.|
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

ingredients: Amaretto: 1 oz.|Kahlua: 1 1/2 oz.|Cream: 1 1/2 oz.|
instructions: Build over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

ingredients: Vodka: 1 oz.|Orange Juice: Fill 1/3|Pineapple Juice: Fill 2/3|
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.  Use the orange juice and pineapple juice to fill in a 1:2 ratio.

ingredients: Amaretto: 1/2 oz.|Rum, coconut: 1 oz.|Cranberry Juice: 3 oz.|Pineapple Juice: 3 oz.|
instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass with ice.

ingredients: Rum, coconut: 1 oz.|Schnapps, peach: 1 oz.|Vodka: 1 oz.|Cranberry Juice: 2 oz.|Pineapple Juice: 2 oz.|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our courageous, yet humble readers, Mike!

ingredients: Rum, coconut: 1 1/2 oz.|Triple Sec: 1 oz.|Vodka: 1 1/2 oz.|Grenadine: 1 dash|Pineapple Juice: Fill with|
instructions: Mix in glass, drink fast.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our damn fine readers, starr!

ingredients: Triple Sec: 1/2 oz.|Sour Apple Pucker: 1/2 oz.|Vodka: 1 1/3 oz.|
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.  Garnish with an apple slice.

ingredients: Schnapps, butterscotch: 2 parts|Sour Apple Pucker: 2 parts|Vodka: 1 part|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our gifted readers, cosnowbaby!

ingredients: Curacao, blue: 1/2 oz.|Schnapps, peach: 1 1/2 oz.|Orange Juice: 4 oz.|Ice: 1 Cup|
instructions: Blend everything (except curacao) together until smooth.  Pour into glass and splash on the curacao.

ingredients: Amaretto: 1 oz.|Irish Cream: 1 oz.|Grand Marnier: 1 oz.|Kahlua: 1 oz.|Vodka: 1 oz.|
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into an old-fashioned glass.

ingredients: Triple Sec: 1 oz.|Vodka: 1 oz.|Lime Juice: 1 oz.|Lime: 1 wedge|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.  Garnish with a lime wedge and a stir stick.

ingredients: Rum, vanilla: 1 1/2 oz.|Triple Sec: 1 1/2 oz.|Orange Juice: Fill with|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass over ice.
contributor: starfish4882

ingredients: Triple Sec: 1 part|Gin: 1 part|Rum, white: 1 part|Syrup, Gomme: 2 parts|Tequila, white: 1 part|Vodka: 1 part|Cola: 1 part|Lemon Juice: 2 parts|
instructions: Pour everything into a collins glass, splashing cola on tthe top, and stir gently.  Garnish with a lemon spiral and a straw.

ingredients: Cognac: 1 oz.|Grand Marnier: 1 oz.|
instructions: Combine ingredients in a brandy snifter.

ingredients: Schnapps, peach: 1 1/2 oz.|Sour Apple Pucker: 1 1/2 oz.|Grenadine: 1 dash|Pineapple Juice: 4 oz.|Sprite: Fill with|
instructions: Build over ice, stir, and enjoy!
contributor: Brian808

ingredients: Amaretto: 2 1/2 oz.|Grand Marnier: 1/4 oz.|Southern Comfort: 1/4 oz.|Vodka: 1/4 oz.|Pineapple Juice: 1 splash|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into an extremely large shot glass.

ingredients: Creme de Cacao, dark: 1 oz.|Rum Cream: 1 oz. (Angostura)|Milk: 2 oz.|Banana: 1/2 whole|Ice: 5 cubes|Sugar Syrup: 1/2 oz.|
instructions: Blend all ingredients and serve.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our courageous, yet humble readers, Jason Swafford!

ingredients: Vodka: 1 shot|Triple Sec: 1/2 shot|Liqueur, melon: 1/2 shot|Triple Sec: 1 shot (Any)|Carbonated Water/Club Soda: 1 splash|Sour Mix: 2 shots (Sweet and Sour)|
instructions: Mix in an old-fashioned, over ice. Stir and enjoy.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our funkadelic readers, Aaron Kirscht!

ingredients: Rum, coconut: 1 1/2 oz.|Schnapps, peach: 1 1/2 oz.|Grenadine: 1 splash|Orange Juice: Fill with|Cherries/Maraschinos: 1 piece|
instructions: Combine coconut rum, peach schnapps, orange juice and grenadine in cocktail shaker with ice. Shake. Pour into tall glass with ice. Add cherry.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our brilliant readers, Nicole!

ingredients: Schnapps, peach: 1 1/2 oz.|Vodka: 1 1/2 oz.|7-up: Fill 1/2|Lime Juice: 1 oz.|Orange Juice: Fill 1/2|
instructions: Add peach schnapps, vodka and lime juice to an irish coffee mug.  Fill half way with orange juice and the rest with 7-up.  Stir well.

ingredients: Irish Cream: 1 shot|Kahlua: 1 shot|Vodka: 1 shot|Milk: 1 Cup|Ice: 1 handful (1 handful)|
instructions: In a blender add 1 shot each of the vodka, Kahlua and Irish Cream then add a handful of ice and blend.  Pour into glass, add milk and drink with straw.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our extremely intelligent readers, Larith DeJesus!

ingredients: Rum, light: 1 1/2 oz.|Schnapps, strawberry: 1 1/2 oz.|Cranberry Juice: 1 splash|Orange Juice: Fill with|
instructions: Mix everything together in glass with ice.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our brilliant readers, Jennifer!

ingredients: Amaretto: 1 1/2 oz.|Carbonated Water/Club Soda: Fill with|Lime Juice: 1/2 oz.|
instructions: Put ice in a collins glass and add Amaretto and lime juice.  Add soda and stir.

ingredients: Everclear: 1 qt.|Apple Juice: 1 gal.|Cider, apple: 1 gal.|Cinnamon Stick: 7 sticks|Sugar: 800 g (4 Cups)|
instructions: Mix apple juice, apple cider, sugar, and cinnamon sticks together. Boil until cinnamon sticks lose flavor. Add Everclear. Refrigerate.
contributor: kandtman

ingredients: Curacao, blue: 1 part|Gin: 1 part|Rum, light: 1 part|Schnapps, peach: 1 part|Triple Sec: 1 part|Vodka: 1 part|Red Bull: 1 can|
instructions: Fill glass full of ice, then add all liquors and stir.  Add full can of Red Bull.  It will float and slowly seep down the glass, turning the mix green, hence the name Irish Trash Can!
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our funktastic readers, atrain!

ingredients: Irish Cream: 1 part|Grand Marnier: 1 part|Kahlua: 1 part|
instructions: Layer Kahlua, Bailey's and then Grand Marnier in a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

ingredients: Rum, coconut: 1 oz.|Rum, overproof/151 proof: 1/2 oz.|Schnapps, peach: 1/2 oz.|Cranberry Juice: 1 oz.|Grenadine: 1 splash|Orange Juice: 1 oz.|Pineapple Juice: 1 oz.|
instructions: Shake everything (except grenadine) with ice.  Pour into a hurricane glass with some ice, splash a bit of grenadine over the ice.

ingredients: Rum, light: 1 oz.|Schnapps, strawberry: 1/2 oz.|Lime Juice: 1 oz.|Strawberries: 1 oz.|Sugar, powdered: 1 tsp.|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

ingredients: J��_germeister: 1 1/2 oz.|Grenadine: 1/2 oz.|Orange Juice: Fill with|
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice.  Add Jagermeister, then fill with orange juice.  Add grenadine on top.

ingredients: Tequila, gold: 1 1/2 oz.|Lime: 1 wedge|Salt: 1 dash|
instructions: Pour a shot of tequila.  Lick your hand between your thumb and your forefinger, and cover the wet spot with some salt.  Lick the salt, shoot the tequila and suck on the lime in quick succession.

ingredients: Tequila, white: 1 1/2 oz.|Grenadine: 1/2 oz.|Orange Juice: 3 oz.|
instructions: Add orange juice and tequila to a highball glass filled with ice. Splash grenadine on top, garnish with an orange slice and a cherry and a straw.  Do not stir.

ingredients: Curacao, blue: 1 oz.|Rum, light: 1 oz.|Cream of coconut: 1 oz.|Pineapple Juice: 2 oz.|Cherries/Maraschinos: 1 whole|Pineapple: 1 slice|Ice: 1 Cup|
instructions: Add all ingredients (except garnishes) to a blender and blend at high speed.  Pour into a highball glass and garnish with the pineapple slice and a cherry.

ingredients: Rum, coconut: 1 oz.|Carbonated Water/Club Soda: 1 oz.|Lime: 3 wedges|Mint: 4 leaves|Sugar: 1 tsp.|
instructions: Muddle lime wedges, mint leaves, and sugar with a splash of club soda. Fill glass with ice and add the Malibu rum ,amp; 1 oz. club soda. Shake all ingredients together. Try not to shake too hard so you don't flatten the soda.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our courageous, yet humble readers, DKNY!

ingredients: Curacao, blue: 1 part|Liqueur, melon: 1 part|Rum, coconut: 1 part|Cranberry Juice: 3 parts|
instructions: Add equal parts of alcohol over ice and fill glass with cranberry juice.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our dastardly readers, Kevin Weigel!

ingredients: Liqueur, melon: 2 oz.|Lemon Juice: 1 1/2 oz.|Sugar Syrup: 1 oz.|
instructions: Fill a rocks glass halfway with ice. Take all ingredients and shake, also with ice. Strain into glass. Infinitely better than the ,quot;sour mix,quot; version of this drink.
contributor: Lemonsawdust

ingredients: Liqueur, melon: 1 part|Southern Comfort: 1 part|Yukon Jack: 1 part|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our beautiful readers, El Negro!

ingredients: Brandy: 2 oz.|Triple Sec: 1/2 oz.|Lemon Juice: 1 oz.|
instructions: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

ingredients: Gin: 1 oz.|Cranberry Juice: Fill with, 1/2|Ginger Ale: Fill with, 1/2|
instructions: Add ingredients over the rocks.
contributor: chetterson

ingredients: Liqueur, melon: 1/2 oz.|Rum, coconut: 1 oz.|Carbonated Water/Club Soda: 1 dash|Ginger Ale: 1 dash|Lime Juice: 1/4 oz.|Lime: 1 quarter|Sugar Syrup: 1 dash|
instructions: Shake all except ginger ale and soda with ice in a shaker, then pour over ice in a long cocktail glass and top with ginger ale and soda.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our immensely powerful readers, Yvette Crowe!

ingredients: Liqueur, banana: 1 oz.|Rum, coconut: 1 oz.|Orange Juice: 2 oz.|Pineapple Juice: 2 oz.|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.  If desired, float 1/2 oz. dark rum on top.

ingredients: Yukon Jack: 2 oz.|Lime Juice: 1 splash|
instructions: Put Yukon Jack in shot glass and add splash of lime juice.
contributor: This drink recipe was submitted by one of our magnificient readers, Mark Young!
